price: 31. Annagaa ah gargaarayaashiin nolosha adduunkan iyo Aakhiradaba, waxaadna leedihiin gudaheeda waxay nafahiinnu doonaan, oo waxaad leedihiin gudaheeda waxaad dalabtaan.
arabic: نَحۡنُ أَوۡلِيَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَا تَشۡتَهِيٓ أَنفُسُكُمۡ وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَا تَدَّعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu awliyāukum fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wafī al-ākhirati walakum fīhā mā tashtahī anfusukum walakum fīhā mā taddaʿūna
